name: A Good Death
description:
Made during Galway Game Jam 12.

A grim, rugged warrior of undetermined gender arrives from the Frozen North to a land wracked by evil. Their goal - to die gloriously in battle against worthy foes. 

Designers:

Ashland Pym: https://uliet.itch.io/

Pat Ryan: https://sycopat.itch.io/

Ciarán "Sarky" O'Brien
